title: How to Make a Violet Sachet

steps.headline: Assemble the items needed.
steps.description: These are listed below under "Things You'll Need".

steps.headline: Make the sachet if you don't have one already.
steps.description: However, sachets can be purchased very cheaply from such places as dollar stores and local craft markets. If it's for a gift, spruce up the sachet with ribbon, lace and maybe some embroidery or a stitched on fabric picture.

steps.headline: Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl.
Pour the sachet powder into a sachet or sachets (depending on the size of your sachets).
Either tie up the sachet or sew it up.
steps.description: It's now ready for use in a wardrobe or drawers.

text: Assemble the items needed. These are listed below under "Things You'll Need". Make the sachet if you don't have one already. However, sachets can be purchased very cheaply from such places as dollar stores and local craft markets. If it's for a gift, spruce up the sachet with ribbon, lace and maybe some embroidery or a stitched on fabric picture. Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix thoroughly to combine well. Pour the sachet powder into a sachet or sachets (depending on the size of your sachets).  Either tie up the sachet or sew it up. It's now ready for use in a wardrobe or drawers.
